name: Unconventional Office Wars
description:
[Ludum Dare # 32 Compo]

Unconventional Office Wars

You just had it! It's time to take revenge on your annoying colleagues and drive them crazy with air-freshener modified with cable ties. Can you get them all before they tackle you down while going crazy?

The first time I attended Ludum Dare and unfortunately I only could spent ~12h working on this game. I used the following tools:

  • Unity3D (v5)
  • Blender
  • Logic
